articles.title: Greece extends border wall amid European fears of Afghan migrant wave - Fox News
articles.description: Greece announced on Friday that it has extended its border wall with Turkey as part of its efforts to stop migrants coming up from Afghanistan -- amid European fears of an Afghan migrant wave sparked by the Taliban takeover.
